starwars.entities.actors

Class BenKenobi

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity

        • starwars.SWActor
          • starwars.SWLegend
            • starwars.entities.actors.BenKenobi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface

    public class BenKenobi
extends SWLegend
    Ben (aka Obe-Wan) Kenobi. At this stage, he's an extremely strong critter with a Lightsaber who wanders around in a fixed pattern and neatly slices any Actor not on his team with his lightsaber. Note that you can only create ONE Ben, like all SWLegends.
    Author:
    rober_000
